title: Nightwish - End Of An Era - IPOD Ready
description: End of an Era is a DVD and double CD from the Finnish symphonic metal band Nightwish. It is a recording of their live performance at the Hartwall Areena in Helsinki, Finland on October 21, 2005, the final concert of a long worldwide tour for their album Once. During the concert the band was joined on-stage by Lakota musician John Two-Hawks, who performed \"Stone People\" from his album Honor as an introduction to \"Creek Mary\&#039;s Blood\", which featured his voice and cedar flutes. End of An Era is the final Nightwish production to feature Tarja Turunen on vocals. She and the rest of the band parted mere hours after this concert.
